title: Possible champion select update to help against having team mates who don't speak your language
body:
Hey,

It's been happening a lot recently where I am being matched with 3/4 Chinese players in Solo queue, and I think a good solution to this, would be having a little section on your profile before you play ranked to select your most comfortable language, so people are able to view what languages people speak in champ select. It's a bit annoying having team mates who you can speak to only via pings because they don't speak the same language as you, and I am sure they feel the same way. 

I think it's a bit of an unfair advantage when 5 people are all speaking the same language and can suggest each other builds, ask questions and so on, and the other team can have a mix of 2/3+ languages

replies.body: The point is there shouldn't be a problem. Riot shouldn't have to cater for something like this as it's not something that should be a problem. Besides, it will just split queue times even more which are already terrible.
The base language of this server is English. Players are expected to speak it at least basically and most countries teach English at both younger and older ages.

That isnt a solution to the problem, its the cause of the problem.

Australia is a multicultural nation, as such we have many residents who dont speak a lick of english.

Some of those people play league.

put two and two together.
